Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::: Hell Beast slmas his fists down on the command chair. He did not want
to
> fight, nor was he ready to engage. But...if they were in an
allience...::::
>
> ::: Hell Beast on a comm unit to Zardus ::: Commander Zardus, this is
> Predacon Commander Hell Beast and I am asking for you assistance in the
> eradication of the Newcomers!
>
> :::  Marine lead the Pred parade out of the ship. Gremlin, Jackle,
Pheniox,
> Black Aracnia, Rampage, Transanulas,  Scourge, Vuloris and his team :::
>
> ::: Hell Beast looks to Cyber Claw ::: Who are you? and what do you want?
> Double Puch, have your team ready to fight soon! And I want Bright Blade
and
> Gangon, and Bumblebee here as well!
>
> ::: With the TM3 driver in his posession, Hell Beast smiles. They wouldnt
be
> able to get it now, not ever. He placed it in a locked, voice activated
vault
> deep within the ship, beyond the point where any intruder could reach it
> without being shot by the internal defences. Only his signiture could open
> it, otherwise three rows of internal auto-guns wouldd rop and reduce the
> fraud to slag. It was a bit much, but Hell Beast invested alot in his well
> being, and no one was getting this device.  ::::
>
> ::: Inferno stood guard at the entrance to the vault, the insane ant,
along
> with Hell Beast would guard it to the death. And the ant would surely take
> someone with him before he was killed. :::
>
> ~~~~~~~~`
>
> :::  Pheniox, and Scourge took to the sky, while the other stormed out
under
> the cover of the auto-guns and shields. :::
>
